name: Direct Paint & Collision
tag_list: auto-body-drexel-hill, auto-body-ardmore, auto-body-bryn-mawr, auto-body-newtown-square-paint-job, body-shop, auto-body-shop, body-shops, auto-body-shops, auto-detailing, car-detailing, auto-body-repair, paint-jobs, collision-center, collision-repair, den
overview: Here at Direct Auto and Collision our motto is “If you are in a wreck, call Direct.” We have been serving the Delaware county for over 30 years, and in that time we have helped countless customers with their damaged vehicles. If your vehicle needs a paint job, we want to do it right, so you the paint job will last the life of your car. We strive to provide excellent customer service in a streamlined operation from the scene of the accident to your car to getting back on the road looking like new. We are happy to tow your vehicle to our body shop in Havertown and provide you with a rental car. We will do all we can to return your car looking like new.
